tool_description: This API allows you to detect faces in images and retrieve information about the detected faces.
name: Face Detection Api
title: Face Detection Api

api_list.name: detect-face-info
api_list.description: Detect faces in an image and retrieve information.

api_list.name: detect-faces-image
api_list.description: Detect faces in an image and receive an image(base64) with bounding boxes.
